alert.note: Alert for Elko (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 24 at 1:22PM PDT until May 24 at 1:45PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: The National Weather Service in Elko Nevada has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Elko County in northeastern Nevada... * Until 145 PM PDT. * At 122 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Spring Creek, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Elko, Lamoille, Spring Creek, Ryndon, Lamoille Summit and Halleck. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
